EmailTemplate.description: Email notification to escrow/lender that the request is received for Reverse Mortgage request
EmailTemplate.name: 3b - Acknowledgment for Reverse Mortgage
EmailTemplate.subject: Case# {!Case.CaseNumber}: Reverse Mortgage request acknowledgment - Lease# {!Case.Lease__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Lease#: {!Case.Lease__c}
Dear {!Account.Name},
We have been notified by your escrow/lender that you are in the process ofa reverse mortgage . We will work directly with your escrow/lender to complete the required documents.
During your reverse mortgage process, SunPower will terminate the fixture filing on SunPower System. Most reverse mortgage requests are completed within 10 to 14 business days.
Should you have any concerns or queries feel free to email us at refinance@sunpower.com or call 1-800-321-1770.
SunPower Case Manager Contact Information: Name: {!Case.OwnerFullName} Email: refinance@sunpower.com Case#: {!Case.CaseNumber}
To Escrow or borrower's representative (For CA states only): The Notice of an Independent Solar Energy Producer Contract will be extinguished. Please send a shipping label (FedEx or UPS) so we may overnight the original Extinguishment document back to your office.
Important Note: Kindly reply to this email thread in order for us to locate the emails faster and respond accordingly.
